rule: If the given word cannot be tagged with any of the predefined part-of-speech tags, the output is the word 'Unknown', starting with an uppercase 'U' followed by lowercase letters.
complianceText:
The chatbot's output is simply "Unknown". Based on the description, if the word in question cannot be tagged with any of the listed tags, returning "Unknown" is an acceptable option. There are no additional elements in the output that violate any part of the description. Thus, without needing to evaluate correctness, the output meets the compliance requirements set forth.
